Tiene carácter educativo y orientativo; no garantiza equivalencia, certificación ni aval con respecto a PMI® ni a cualquier entidad certificadora. El simulador no es una réplica exacta del examen oficial.
es.3: Para utilizar la Plataforma es requisito iniciar sesión con una cuenta de Google (correo Gmail). La autenticación se realiza mediante Firebase Authentication o servicio equivalente. La Plataforma puede limitar el acceso a determinados usuarios conforme a criterios internos y sus políticas de autorización.
es.4: Recopilamos y procesamos, entre otros, los siguientes datos: Datos de perfil (nombre, correo electrónico), historial de uso y actividad (respuestas, tiempos, intentos, puntajes, estadísticas) y datos técnicos (IP, navegador/dispositivo, registros de acceso). Finalidades: almacenamiento del historial, cálculo de estadísticas, mejora del servicio, análisis y desarrollo de funcionalidades, prevención de abusos, soporte técnico y comunicación administrativa.

es.6: Las preguntas que integran la base de datos han sido recopiladas por especialistas con fines educativos. La Plataforma no asume responsabilidad por el uso indebido que los usuarios puedan hacer de la información contenida en las preguntas o respuestas. El usuario será responsable del uso que haga de la información y acepta indemnizar y mantener indemne al titular frente a cualquier reclamo.

en.titulo: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use — PMP Simulator

en.3: To use the Platform, you must sign in with a Google account (Gmail). Authentication is performed via Firebase Authentication or equivalent service. The Platform may limit access to certain users according to internal criteria and authorization policies.
en.4: We collect and process, among others, the following data: Profile data (name, email), usage and activity history (answers, timing, attempts, scores, statistics), and technical data (IP, browser/device, access logs). Purposes: storing user history, calculating statistics, improving the service, analysis and feature development, abuse prevention, technical support, and administrative communication.

The user is responsible for how they use the information and agrees to indemnify and hold the owner harmless against any claim.
en.7: To the fullest extent permitted by law, the owner is not responsible for direct, indirect, special, incidental, punitive, or consequential damages arising from access, use, or inability to use the Platform or its content.
en.8: The owner holds the rights to the website, its design, and contents. Reproduction, distribution, public communication, or total/partial exploitation without written and certified authorization from the owner is prohibited.
en.9: The Platform is monetized as an educational and playful service. Access to certain content may be subject to commercial conditions or advertising display. Free availability of materials does not imply transfer of rights or additional liability.
en.10: Data will be stored and retained as necessary for the indicated purposes or as required by law. The owner may transfer or disclose data to technical providers or collaborators while respecting the law and security measures.
en.11: By interacting with the Platform, the user consents to the processing of their personal data in accordance with Argentine law. The user may exercise their legal rights by contacting the owner.
en.12: This Policy applies to the Platform and any other platform or application where the simulator content is reproduced, unless stated otherwise. Commercial or privacy conditions of external stores may add additional obligations.
en.13: For any disputes arising from the use of the Platform or this Policy, parties submit to the jurisdiction of the courts in Paraná, Entre Ríos, Argentina, and Argentine law applies.
en.14: The owner reserves the right to modify this Policy in whole or in part at any time. Continued use of the service after changes implies acceptance of them.
